values: This is the year of lost. It is a sensation that I am accustomed to but, not what I anticipated now. No, not now, not at 29 with a career and bills and shit to root me where I am. It is the year of lost and regret. Regret, is also familiar, it is engrained in me because I do not act, I languish and then sink, falling fast to the bottom, heavy, aimless however always to the bottom. I cannot imagine how to escape lost or regret, and so I don't.
"It is not true that people stop pursuing dreams because they grow old, they grow old because they stop pursuing dreams."
i've been thinking about you a lot these last few days. you'll always be my Betty.
C'est une question de l'heure sans l'heure.
dites-moi what is youth, dear reader; what is time; what is life; what is still?
"I'm so gifted at findin' what I don't like the most."
porque tambien somos lo que hemos perdido
"you want me be somebody who im really not"
"cada vez que te busco, te vas"

parfois, je reste dans l'ombre de ton coeur, seule. 

sing, sing, sing songs, sing sordid songs, sing and i will whisper sweet, toxic words of transgression and beauty and the future.
revolutionaries with discontent, no intent. life is ruin. you end tonight, when i begin please return.
the story of yesterday pierces through the darkness like sudden explosions of a storm within the confines of this shithole.
i have absolutely no clue what it is i am doing with my life.
why am i incapable of making a decision i can live with.

des vivants

j'ai peur de me réveiller. you lose your significance to me outside of the moment.
i  am distracted and confused. i graduate in less than a month and move to boston at the end of the summer.
loneliness is a terrible disaster.  i am a disordered 22 year old mistake.
what if i  dont go to graduate school, and become a prostitute?

i chose to not study abroad in paris this semester, i chose to not graduate a semester early, i have chosen to not take the 2 reserach/theory courses necessary for the additional degree in sociology, i chose to not study for history/systems, i chose to disengage.  
what do i do now?

youve disturbed the ground, beneath us, its breaking, exploding. the wind outside screams, fucking tree branches pushing and pulling, faster.  
you were never a good liar.
il n'y a rien qui change

after the rain, these streets are black; the ascent of smoke from the cement is slow, sensual. these streets are deserted once the sky has closed its eyes, ceased to cry and purify the perpetually unclean.

I am the old man’s memory
Laying in this perfect place,
Where the noise does not intrude
Drowning in this horrid heat,
Where the darkness is blinding
Your heart, this vociferous pool
Vibrates wildly
When our arms brush
In passing,
In memoriam.
i want so much to have something to say. unfortunately, i dont.

the wind howls, singing the song of sirens. madwomen lulled to silence by tormented lovers, criminals with illicit motives to desecrate the existence of rapture. under the pretext of love, the wind is stable and constant.

drowning in sin, the weight of desire and loyalty pulling your body deeper into this suffocating heat, your body burns as the plague of reality kisses the flesh you expose to elicit birds who fly free from fear for forgiveness, your body lays deserted, submerged in sin, your body transcends carnal existence for sin. i want to live in 2007.

holy ghost, sing to me, i see your voice rising from beneath this cold, wooden floor, its thick and suffocating, i can feel my heart beat slow, slow, slow, youre killing me, leaden smoke, beautiful song, thief.
one of the football players i tutored last year asked me out tonight. motivation, please sir i want some more. finals week i loathe you
slow hiss purged by metal pipes ravished by rust in silence
white clouds dance around his lips; demanding an end to the black night sky, i am mesmerized by the words weak lovers whisper to reveal la fin.
your voice crawls beneath my skin. in this illusive shame, i am your prey.
i could show you the world tonight; the moon, an orange crescent suspended in the sky is a bridge from my body to places gods revere.
life is a tragedy for those who feel and a comedy for those who think

decomposing under your skin, this resurrection of nostalgia sings the song of sorrow it will swallow you whole, your body rotting as everything around you grows in extreme abundance; this world is drowning.
